name: Space Has Rocks
description:
Very similar to Atari Asteroids, this recreation focuses more on a level based arcade system with an increasing difficulty. Shoot space rocks to collect points and get the required amount of points to move on to the next level. There are power-ups like the Laser which enables auto-fire for several seconds and the Shield which gives the ship a 3-hit shield to bounce space rocks around. There are secrets at Level 5 and Level 10 but be warned, the difficulty quickly increases.

Still has room for development. May be adding more to Level 10 and balancing spawn-rates and stuff.

This is one of my first games so constructive criticism is appreciated!
